properties.name: 6:15 PM AA Meeting
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing296 9th Ave. at 28th St., NY, NY6:15 pm Monday. Holy Apostles Church (Rectory). If you can\'t get to the 6:15 go to the 7:45 discussion or 9:00 beginners\' meeting. I found this the MOST helpful meeting for me when I had under 90 days of sobriety. I still go for its raw truth. Highly recommended! (royy.com)

properties.name: 6:15 PM AA Meeting
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing487 Hudson Street, NY, NY7:15 pm Monday. Greenwich Village, St. Luke\'s Episcopal Church School (basement). There are a substantial number of women at this meeting, as well as a large number of people with long-term sobriety. (royy.com)

properties.name: 6:30AM ATTITUDE ADJUSTMENT
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing2450 Alliance Rd., Arcata, CA6:30 A.M. Monday. ATTITUDE ADJUSTMENT Trinity Baptist church. Open. Wheelchair access.

properties.name: 7 AM Morning Glories AA meeting
properties.description: Posted by Justine11 Garden Street, Cambridge, MA 02138Morning Glories - woman\'s AA meeting, every weekday 7-8 AM, Mondays Big Book, Tuesdays Step, Wednesdays Speaker, Thursdays Discussion, Fridays Promises. Lots of quirky, smart, opinionated women with decades of sobriety. Gay friendly.

properties.name: 7 PM Live & Let Live
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 420 E. 76th St., NY, NY7:00 pm Tuesday. Live & Let Live, Gracie Square Hospital. (if you can\'t get to the 7:00 go to the small 8:30 discussion meeting)

properties.name: 8:30 PM AA Meeting
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing224 Waverly Place at 11th St, NY, NY8:30 pm Sunday. Red Door, Saint John\'s Episcopal Church, 224 Waverly Place at 11th St.

properties.name: 9:00AM AA EVERYDAY
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing201 Del Norte St., Crescent City, CA9:00 A.M. Monday. AA EVERYDAY. Open.

properties.name: Alanon-Aa-Na-Information & Meetings
properties.description: Posted by System41 North Supai Drive, Springerville, AZ, 85938Alanon-Aa-Na-Information & Meetings 928-333-4970

properties.name: Noon AA Meeting
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing208 West 13th Street, NY, NY12:00 n High Noon, Sunday. Gay & Lesbian Community Center, 208 West 13th Street (btw 7th & 8th Aves) (make sure to get there by 11:15 am to get a good seat. Really.) Large meeting, equal numbers of men and women, fine speakers 5+ years sober.

properties.name: Noon AA Meeting
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing272 West 10th St., NY, NY12:00 noon, Sunday. New Group, Village Community School, (btw Washington & Greenwich Sts. A quieter meeting, lots of long-term sobriety.

properties.name: Noon JUST FOR TODAY
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing2298 Norris Ave., Crescent City, CA12:00 P.M. Monday (O)(W) JUST FOR TODAY 12x12 United Indian Lodge. Open. Wheelchair access

properties.name: Open To All AA meeting
properties.description: Posted by Justine   3 Church Street, Cambridge, MA 02138Open To All is a Speaker Discussion meeting in Harvard Square Monday nights, 8-9:30. It\'s mostly gay, very friendly people, and has the best snacks of any AA meeting in the Cambridge area. The last 20 minutes are reserved for newcomers (less than a year sober). An excellent meeting.
